name: Etereo
description:
The evil spreads through the woods

Will this child, with the power of the white smoke, be able to seal it again?

Help him in his adventure, exorcising the corrupted forest dwellers and destroying the darkness dispensers.

The forest have to be free again.


WHY ETEREO?

Etereo came up as an experiment of creating a game in one month.

At PipeRift we wanted to create something new, that's why we decided to create a game from zero in just one month. This gave us the opportunity to work with new people and discover more about us.

If you decide to play it, we will love to receive your honest feedback!
